commit.message:
texi2pod.pl: Escape braces in regexp involving @strong{...}.

	* texi2pod.pl: Escape braces in regexp involving @strong{...}.

From-SVN: r226585

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@

+

+
